content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a man named Peter Schmidt from Germany. He is a potential landlord offering an apartment for rent in Magdeburg.
name: Max Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of an apartment in Magdeburg, Germany. It is an unfurnished, 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: Yes, we agreed on a final price of 515 euros per month with a two-year lease term.
name: Max Müller

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final agreed-upon price was 515 euros per month.
name: Max Müller

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Peter Schmidt, as an 8.
name: Max Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Max Müller
